original_text: And thou hast shewed this day how that thou hast dealt well with me: forasmuch as when the Lord had delivered me into thine hand, thou killedst me not.
korean_text: 네가 나 선대한 것을 오늘 나타냈나니 여호와께서 나를 네 손에 넘기셨으나 네가 나를 죽이지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: And thou hast shewed this day
how that thou hast dealt well with me:
forasmuch as when the Lord had delivered me into thine hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 나를 네 손에 넘기셨을 때에도
